title: Why i dont have the icon of april fool?
body:
i thought that i just need to play on april fool to get the icon and i dont have nothing and i asked to my friends that got it and they told me that i just need to play :| 
ammm help? pls :)

replies.body: The icon's are still going out, so no worries! You should still receive it within the next day or so, but if you don't, reach out to us through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to get that taken care of!

To piggy back on this, it may take a bit for everyone to receive their icon.   Per the [announcement ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/advanced-bot-tests-live-normals)page, it can take a few weeks to unlock on your account.  There are a lot of eligible accounts, so some players may see it before others.  Just hang tight for now, and the goods will come!

I waited for my april fools icon as you said and i dont receive one
what i do now?
OK OK i'm going to believe in you guys i'll wait for amm 1 more week? 2 maybe?
